A plundered land struggle to survive after a nuclear holocaust has left the world in ruins.
The survivors have joined together in communities and villages, trying to live with the few resources they have left. Ruthless gangs from the distant moors savaged them for their resources or, sometimes, just for fun.
A mysterious martial arts master named Kenshiro, a man with seven scars on his chest, and the chosen successor to the legendary martial art of Hokuto Shinken murder has sworn to protect the weak and innocent of harmful bands that swarm the ravaged planet.
